diagnosis.final_diagnosis: adenosquamous carcinoma of the cervix (grade 2 out of 3), stage T1b2
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was based on pathological examination of cervical biopsy specimens revealing an invasive tumor with lymphovascular invasion and histological features consistent with adenosquamous carcinoma. Initial findings included a friable, polypoid mass, and subsequent imaging and examination confirmed the tumor's progression and characteristics.
